title: Description of roles and access of the Manager
content: What he can do:Add and modify schedulesPlan holidays and vacationsAdd and approve timesheets Modify employees' availabilityChange group passwords Save and print the necessary reports to the payroll manager for verification purposesWhat he can't do:See salaries and other financial informationAdd a new employeeChange the position of existing employeesModify the roles of other users, including their ownFind another managerSend a message to another managerVia the manager portal: he only sees the Admin, without the other ManagersVia the employee portal: he only sees the employees, without the other Managers or the AdminsVia the mobile application: He sees the employees, the other Managers and the AdminsManagerCan perform a specific employee searchCan perform the actions listed aboveLimited Manager Cannot perform a specific searchCannot make changes (does not have a Save Button)A more detailed table of access rights is available by clicking here. Setting up your accountAn Administrator must create and configure your account as required: Give you the Manager role,You assign the necessary rights: assign the departments for which you must have rights.If you have changes to make, you must contact an Administrator:You are missing a department for schedule planning and/or timesheets: Check access rightsYou are missing an employee in your department: Add the position to the employeeThe employee does not appear in the correct department: Add the correct position to the employeeYour access is disabled or no longer functional: Reactivate an accountManager access to the mobile applicationThe manager can download the mobile application and use their accesses to:Display the schedules of employees in its departments: one by one or by dayView employee requests: in the Messages section, by categoryTo find out more about a manager's access, click here. The recipients of the different portals are different from each other:The management portal The employee portal L’application mobile (sur le téléphone intelligent)On the employee portal, he sees only the Admin, without the other Managers.On the management portal, he only sees the employees, without the other managers or admins.On the mobile app, he sees employees, other managers, and admins.Changes my accessFor security reasons, the Emprez team reserves the right not to make changes to accounts of the Manager type without the authorization of its Administrator. The latter can make any necessary changes to your account.If you need help, you can contact a member of the customer service team.Related articles: Create a Manager access Supprimer un accès ResponsableHelpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
